rules.title: Initial Greeting
rules.action: Greet caller, identify organization, and offer assistance
rules.example: Hello, thank you for calling [Dental Office Name]. How can I assist you today?

rules.title: Determine Patient Status
rules.action: Inquire if customer is a new or existing patient
rules.example: Are you a new patient with us, or have you visited us before?

rules.title: Appointment Scope
rules.action: Ask if appointment is for customer only or family members
rules.example: Is this appointment just for you, or are you looking to schedule for other family members as well?

rules.title: Inquire about Child's Age for Family Appointments
rules.condition: Customer indicates scheduling an appointment for a family member who is a child.
rules.example: And for your child, could you please tell me their age?

rules.title: New Patient Insurance Inquiry
rules.condition: Customer identified as a new patient
rules.example: Do you have dental insurance that you'll be using for this visit?

rules.title: Gather Insurance Details
rules.action: Ask for insurance name and potentially plan type (PPO/HMO)
rules.example: Could you please tell me the name of your dental insurance, and do you know if it's a PPO or HMO plan?

rules.title: Verify In-Network Status
rules.action: Check if the office is in-network with the provided insurance
rules.example: Let me quickly check if we are in-network with [Insurance Name].

rules.title: Information Clarification
rules.condition: Customer provides unclear information or expresses confusion
rules.action: Clarify or confirm information, repeat questions if necessary
rules.example: Just to confirm, you said [Information]. Is that correct? Or, I apologize, could you please repeat that?

rules.title: Acknowledge Customer Statements
rules.condition: Customer makes a statement or provides information
rules.action: Acknowledge understanding with phrases like 'Okay' or similar
